sections.heading: Short title.Section 76-25-2 - Definitions
sections.text:
This act [76-25-1 to 76-25-5 NMSA 1978] may be cited as the "Healthy Soil Act".

History:Laws 2019, ch. 126, § 1.

Effective dates.— Laws 2019, ch. 126 contained no effective date provision, but, pursuant to N.M. Const., art. IV, § 23, was effective June 14, 2019, 90 days after the adjournment of the legislature.

sections.heading: Definitions.
Healthy soil program; created; purpose.
sections.text:
A. The "healthy soil program" is created in the department. The department, with support and advice from the commission, shall administer the program.

B. The purpose of the program is to promote and support farming and ranching systems and other forms of land management that increase soil organic matter, aggregate stability, microbiology and water retention to improve the health, yield and profitability of the soils of the state.

History:Laws 2019, ch. 126, § 3.

Effective dates.— Laws 2019, ch. 126 contained no effective date provision, but, pursuant to N.M. Const., art. IV, § 23, was effective June 14, 2019, 90 days after the adjournment of the legislature.
